summary: REQ-26 appears implemented by changing default admin credentials in backend/main.mo and adding a migration (backend/migration.mo) wired via `(with migration = Migration.run)` to force persisted credentials to the new values on upgrade. REQ-27 appears implemented by updating the shared config email to ceilingpro9@gmail.com. REQ-28 appears implemented by restoring default service-card image paths to /images/service1.jpg..service4.jpg in both backend defaults and frontend service definitions, plus frontend hook defaults.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/modified hero image default handling (backend sets heroImage to /images/hero.jpg; frontend hook defaults heroImage to a generated asset path) which is not requested by REQ-26/27/28.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to update admin credentials, change public contact email, and restore prior service-card images; no requirement mentions changing hero image defaults.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed admin ImagesEditor helper text to suggest using generated asset paths (e.g., /assets/generated/image.png), which is not explicitly requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-28 is about restoring prior service card images; it does not request changing admin UI guidance text.
